Interface Animatable

public interface Animatable
Represents an object that can be animated.

Any engine or game object can implement this to plug into janimation. The library will call drawFrame(java.awt.Graphics2D, java.awt.image.BufferedImage, int, int, int, int) to render animation frames.

  • Method Details

    • getX

      float getX()
      Returns:
      X position of this object in world or pixel space.

    • getY

      float getY()
      Returns:
      Y position of this object in world or pixel space.

    • drawFrame

      void drawFrame(Graphics2D g, BufferedImage frame, int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Called by the animation system to draw the current frame.
      Parameters:
      g - Graphics2D context to draw on.
      frame - Current frame image.
      x - X position in pixels.
      y - Y position in pixels.
      width - Width to render.
      height - Height to render.
